FareRules.FareRuleDetail:
The FareBasisCode is: USAV1
  • Facilitation Fee of Rs.200 per passenger per flight - for Tele Check-in done at Reservations.
  • An Additional Sum of Rs.350 per passenger per flight for flight change / booking cancellation processed via Reservations and Airport Ticketing Counters. This fee will not apply to CELT bookings.

COVID - 19 Important Travel guidelines
  • After booking its mandatory for all passengers to do “Web check-in” their PNR with pre-selected seats to avoid the long queue at the airport.
  • Passengers travelling with Checked-in luggage, need to add their luggage during web check-in. Per Passenger 1 piece of Checked in Baggage upto 15 kgs will be allowed. Addition to this one small hand luggage less than of 7 Kgs per passenger will be allowed.
  • Carriage of printout of Boarding card and Baggage label which will be sent to the guest on their contact details or can download during web check-in
  • Also can carry Mobile boarding pass and carry printed or written baggage label, format will be available on SpiceJet website.
  • Before reaching to the airport, Passenger need to paste the attached Baggage label on the baggage OR guest can write the mandatory fields i.e. PNR, Name of the passenger, Sector and Flight Number on plain paper & paste the same on baggage which should be prominently visible, as airport may not be having any pasting material to place the labels on the baggage.
  • Each passenger Contact number and Email id is mandatory to be provided during booking.
  • Partners are requested to provide the Boarding pass and Baggage labels to the guests for their seamless travel.
  • Passenger Health declaration status and their mobile should have “Arogya Setu” app which shows Green status.
  • Passenger must be wearing mask properly at the airport & throughout the journey.
  • Passenger must sanitize at airports at various points.
  • Maintain Social distancing at the airport as per the markings/guidance.
For Safety of all customers, SpiceJet reserves the rights to refuse the carriage of any passenger whose contact details are missing. Also, its mandatory to do the Web Check-in.
